description:
Kurihara-san agrees to go to the barbecue. The super excited Kurihara-san prepares for the barbecue by going shopping with Norika. The day of the barbecue, she engages in lively conversation with Momo-kun`s friends, and everyone seems to be having fun, but there`s something Momo-kun just can`t say... Eating meat, frolicking about, and blowing bubbles, Kurihara-san and her friends enjoy the barbecue each in their own way. However, the low temperatures keep them from playing in the water, which means Kurihara-san will lose her chance to show off her swimsuit to Momo-kun?! The thought depresses Kurihara-san, but when Momo-kun sees how she`s feeling...
Source: crunchyroll
